shrimp.name: Buratti
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Buratti photometric model, a combination of the Lommel-Seeliger lunar scattering law, and Lambert's law, the parameter k describing the fraction of light that is multiply scattered, with 1 corresponding to single scattering, and the parameter sden corresponding to the surface density for the macroscopic roughness function.
